fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Protect (Night): Protect a target, giving them Powerful defense against one attack. You will deal a Basic attack to any non-Unseen attackers. If they have defense or if your target is attacked multiple times, you will not protect or attack, but learn the names and roles of all attackers.
-Distract (Night): Distract all protective roles on a target. They will not be notified of this. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Distract is not a roleblock, it simply causes protective roles to visit but not use their ability on their target.
